title: Awesome List Updates on Aug 20, 2021

items.title: Awesome Fastapi
items.content_text:
### Videos / Other Tools

*   [FastAPI vs. Django vs. Flask](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9YBAOYQOzWs) - Which framework is best for Python in 2020? Which uses async/await the best? Which is the fastest?
items.content_html:
Videos / Other Tools

  • FastAPI vs. Django vs. Flask - Which framework is best for Python in 2020? Which uses async/await the best? Which is the fastest?

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Anti-Malware

- API: [MalShare](https://malshare.com/doc.php)

  Description: Malware Archive / file sourcing

  Auth: `apiKey`

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: No



### Sports & Fitness

- API: [Tredict](https://www.tredict.com/blog/oauth_docs/)

  Description: Get and set activities, health data and more

  Auth: `OAuth`

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Unknown
items.content_html:
Anti-Malware

  • API: MalShare

    Description: Malware Archive / file sourcing

    Auth: apiKey

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: No

Sports & Fitness

  • API: Tredict

    Description: Get and set activities, health data and more

    Auth: OAuth

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Unknown

items.title: Awesome Svelte
items.content_text:
### Fonts / Form Components

*   [svelte-web-fonts/google (⭐16)](https://github.com/svelte-web-fonts/google) - Tiny component for easily loading Fonts via the Google Fonts API including autocompletion.
items.content_html:
Fonts / Form Components

  • svelte-web-fonts/google (⭐16) - Tiny component for easily loading Fonts via the Google Fonts API including autocompletion.

items.title: Awesome Microservices
items.content_text:
### Articles & Papers / Scala

*   [Awesome Scalability (⭐63k)](https://github.com/binhnguyennus/awesome-scalability) :star: - An updated and organized reading list for illustrating the patterns of scalable, reliable, and performant large-scale systems. Concepts are explained in the articles of prominent engineers and credible references. Case studies are taken from battle-tested systems that serve millions to billions of users.
*   [A Sidecar for Your Service Mesh](https://www.abhishek-tiwari.com/a-sidecar-for-your-service-mesh/) - A short service mesh introduction.
items.content_html:
Articles & Papers / Scala

  • Awesome Scalability (⭐63k) ⭐ - An updated and organized reading list for illustrating the patterns of scalable, reliable, and performant large-scale systems. Concepts are explained in the articles of prominent engineers and credible references. Case studies are taken from battle-tested systems that serve millions to billions of users.
  • A Sidecar for Your Service Mesh - A short service mesh introduction.

items.title: Awesome Wagtail
items.content_text:
### Apps / Media

*   [Wagtail Makeup (⭐6)](https://github.com/kevinhowbrook/wagtail-makeup) - A plugin that replaces all your images with [Unsplash](https://unsplash.com/) images.
items.content_html:
Apps / Media

  • Wagtail Makeup (⭐6) - A plugin that replaces all your images with Unsplash images.

items.content_html:
Integration / Community

items.title: Awesome Robotic Tooling
items.content_text:
### Simulation / Version Control

*   [safe-control-gym (⭐743)](https://github.com/utiasDSL/safe-control-gym) - PyBullet-based CartPole and Quadrotor environments—with CasADi symbolic dynamics and constraints—for safe and robust learning-based control.
items.content_html:
Simulation / Version Control

  • safe-control-gym (⭐743) - PyBullet-based CartPole and Quadrotor environments—with CasADi symbolic dynamics and constraints—for safe and robust learning-based control.
